title: Merge branch 'docs/android-developer-style' into 'main'
message:
Merge branch 'docs/android-developer-style' into 'main'

docs: restyle documentation to Android Developer design

See merge request android-team/v3/devops/ci-component!81

title: docs: restyle documentation to Android Developer design
message:
docs: restyle documentation to Android Developer design

- Replace Apple-inspired CSS with Material Design 3 / Android theme
- Add Android Robot mascot SVG (CC-BY 3.0) to homepage hero section
- Use Teal (#00796B) as primary color, Android Green (#3DDC84) as accent
- Switch to Roboto font (Android's official typeface)
- Add hero section with gradient text and CTA buttons
- Implement Material dark mode (#1F1F1F - softer on eyes)
- Add mobile responsive styles for hero and tables
- Include CC-BY 3.0 attribution in footer for Android robot

Design inspired by developer.android.com

title: Merge branch 'docs/migrate-hugo-to-mkdocs' into 'main'
message:
Merge branch 'docs/migrate-hugo-to-mkdocs' into 'main'

docs: migrate from Hugo to MkDocs Material

See merge request android-team/v3/devops/ci-component!80

title: docs: migrate from Hugo to MkDocs Material
message:
docs: migrate from Hugo to MkDocs Material

- Replace Hugo + Hextra with MkDocs Material for pure Markdown docs
- Add Apple-inspired styling (frosted glass, system fonts, rounded tables)
- Create unified index.md homepage readable as raw Markdown
- Update CI/CD to use Python 3.12 slim image with pip caching
- Delete Hugo artifacts (content/, hugo.yaml, go.mod, go.sum)
- Fix internal links to use .md extensions for MkDocs compatibility

Homepage is now readable in GitLab's raw file viewer while rendering
beautifully with MkDocs Material theme and Apple design elements.

title: Merge branch 'docs/cleanup-and-improvements' into 'main'

Merge branch 'docs/cleanup-and-improvements' into 'main'

docs: cleanup and improve Hugo documentation site

See merge request android-team/v3/devops/ci-component!79

title: docs: cleanup and improve Hugo documentation site
message:
docs: cleanup and improve Hugo documentation site

- Delete duplicate docs/ folder (content now in content/docs/)
- Add 60-second quickstart to docs landing page
- Fix broken links and standardize to no .md extension
- Update copyright to Nueca Android Team
- Add theme toggle to navbar, Documentation icon
- Improve hero layout with side-by-side title and button
- Add spacing improvements to home page
- Remove redundant headings and improve link text
- Update platform status with emoji indicators

title: Merge branch 'feat/writerside-docs' into 'main'
message:
Merge branch 'feat/writerside-docs' into 'main'

feat(docs): migrate documentation from MkDocs to Writerside

See merge request android-team/v3/devops/ci-component!78

title: feat(docs): migrate from Writerside to Hugo + Hextra theme
message:
feat(docs): migrate from Writerside to Hugo + Hextra theme

- Replace Writerside (2GB Docker image, 5+ min builds) with Hugo (185MB, ~10s builds)
- Add Hextra theme v0.11.1 with search, dark mode, and card components
- Migrate 15 documentation files to content/docs/ with proper frontmatter
- Update .gitlab-ci.yml: Hugo build job with hugomods/hugo:go-git image
- Add custom CSS for Roboto font family
- Configure GitLab Pages deployment for docs site

title: fix(ci): add docker tags to Writerside jobs
message:
fix(ci): add docker tags to Writerside jobs

Writerside jobs require Docker images but were running on shell executor
(Mac Mini 1). Adding tags: [docker] ensures jobs run on Docker-capable runners.

title: fix(docs): remove module element from writerside.cfg
message:
fix(docs): remove module element from writerside.cfg

The module element is optional and was causing confusion with the
Writerside builder. The directory name 'Writerside' is what matters
for the INSTANCE variable in CI.

title: feat(docs): migrate documentation from MkDocs to Writerside
message:
feat(docs): migrate documentation from MkDocs to Writerside

Replace MkDocs Material with JetBrains Writerside for documentation.

Changes:
- Add Writerside project structure (writerside.cfg, cd.tree, v.list)
- Migrate all docs/*.md files to Writerside/topics/
- Update .gitlab-ci.yml with Writerside build pipeline (build:docs, test:docs, pages)
- Remove mkdocs.yml configuration
- Update .gitignore for Writerside output directories

Writerside is JetBrains' documentation tool, better suited for Kotlin/Android
projects with modern output, IDE integration, and official Docker builder.

title: Merge branch 'fix/detekt-allow-failure' into 'main'

Merge branch 'fix/detekt-allow-failure' into 'main'

fix(ci): allow lint:detekt job to fail on artifact upload issues

See merge request android-team/v3/devops/ci-component!77

title: fix(ci): allow lint:detekt job to fail on artifact upload issues
message:
fix(ci): allow lint:detekt job to fail on artifact upload issues

Detekt reports are informational and should not block pipelines when
GitLab artifact storage has connectivity issues.

title: Merge branch 'feat/docs-site' into 'main'

title: feat(docs): add MkDocs Material documentation site for GitLab Pages
message:
feat(docs): add MkDocs Material documentation site for GitLab Pages

- Add mkdocs.yml with Material theme, dark/light mode, and navigation
- Add docs/index.md landing page with quick start examples
- Rename docs/README.md to docs/overview.md for better navigation
- Add pages job to .gitlab-ci.yml with pip caching and strict build
- Configure site for offline support and code copy feature
- Update .gitignore to exclude generated site/ directory

Closes AT-230
